email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider coming down to the mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 sounds more reasonable. However, the demurrage rate is still on the higher side. Could we negotiate this down to $18,000 per day? Also, can we confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve managed to secure a demurrage rate of $18,500 per day, which is the best I can do. The laycan remains 15-20 October. If this works for you, we can proceed with the fixture. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $18,500 per day for demurrage is acceptable. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $48.50 per metric ton. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks for your efforts. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find the fixture recap attached. Summary: MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, Houston to Rotterdam, laycan 15-20 October, freight rate $48.50 per metric ton, demurrage $18,500 per day pro rata. Let me know if everything looks good. Best, Sarah
